import React, { useState } from 'react' import { ItemCart } from '../../model/ItemCart' import './Checkout.css' import OrderItemShow from './OrderItemShow' interface Props{ itemCarts: ItemCart[], totalMoney:number, onclickShowCarts:()=>void } export default function CheckoutForm(props:Props) { return (

Your info:

Your order

{props.itemCarts.map(item=>)}

Total: {props.totalMoney} $

Phuong thuc thanh toan

) }
